LanguageData.Ageless.label: ageless
LanguageData.Ageless.description: Carriers of this gene have archites in the bloodstream which continuously reverse the process of aging. Starting at the age of 13, carriers begin to biologically age slower. By 18, the aging process stops completely.
LanguageData.ArchiteMetabolism.label: archite metabolism
LanguageData.ArchiteMetabolism.description: Carriers of this gene have special archites in their cells that facilitate and optimize metabolism. This improves overall genetic and metabolic quality.
LanguageData.Deathless.label: deathless
LanguageData.Deathless.description: Carriers of this gene have archites in the blood which will sustain their life processes no matter what. As long as the brain remains intact, a carrier of this gene will never die.
LanguageData.Deathless.customEffectDescriptions.0: Can only die from destruction of brain.
LanguageData.Deathrest.label: deathrest
LanguageData.Deathrest.description: Carriers of this gene must periodically regenerate themselves in a special coma called deathrest. Deathrest takes days, but can confer substantial bonuses. Deathrest can be accelerated and its effects enhanced by the use of a variety of special buildings and technologies.\n\nThose who put off deathresting will suffer from deathrest exhaustion.
LanguageData.DiseaseFree.label: non-senescent
LanguageData.DiseaseFree.description: Carriers of this gene do not go through senescence in the normal way. They never get chronic age-related diseases like cancer, bad back, cataracts, or dementia.
LanguageData.FireTerror.label: пірофобія
LanguageData.FireTerror.description: Носії цього гена мають сильний страх перед вогнем. При близькій пожежі у них в будь-який момент може статися психічний зрив.
LanguageData.FireTerror.customEffectDescriptions.0: Може мати психічні зриви при знаходженні поблизу вогню.
LanguageData.FireWeakness.label: тонкошкірий
LanguageData.FireWeakness.description: Носії мають суху, тонку шкіру, яка легко обгорає від вогню, а їхня імунна система дуже погано реагує на такого роду загрози. Збитки від вогню множаться на 4.
LanguageData.HemogenDrain.label: hemogen drain
LanguageData.HemogenDrain.description: Carriers lose an additional 8 hemogen per day from biological entropy.
LanguageData.Hemogenic.label: гемогенний
LanguageData.Hemogenic.description: Carriers of this gene have a reserve of biological strength powered by a resource called hemogen. The resource can be gained and spent in various ways, all of which are unlocked by other genes.\n\nCarriers lose 2 hemogen per day from biological entropy.
LanguageData.Hemogenic.resourceDescription:
A reserve of biological strength which can be gained and spent in a variety of ways.

Hemogen can be increased by bloodfeeding from a human or consuming hemogen packs. You can obtain hemogen packs using the 'extract hemogen pack' medical operation on a non-hemogenic human.

If hemogen reaches zero, {PAWN_nameDef} will become very unhappy.
LanguageData.PerfectImmunity.label: perfect immunity
LanguageData.PerfectImmunity.description: Carriers of this gene have archite-enhanced immune systems which intelligently destroy invaders. They are totally immune to most normal illnesses.
LanguageData.TotalHealing.label: глибока регенерація
LanguageData.TotalHealing.description: Носії цього гена мають особливий тип клітин-регенераторів, які здатні загоювати старі рани та хронічні захворювання, такі як біль у спині.
LanguageData.TotalHealing.customEffectDescriptions.0: Кожні (*DateTime)15-30 днів(/DateTime), зцілюється одна стара рана або хронічна хвороба.
